app.title: ToonMe photo cartoon maker
app.description:
Do you feel like creating a cartoon me photo art of your selfie? Are you looking for a fresh new avatar for your Instagram profile? Look no more! With ToonMe, a cartoon creator and selfie editor with loads of face filters, you can turn your selfie into astonishing art that makes you stand out!
You can cartoon yourself in any way you want, and the outcome is only one tap away. Our cartoon creator features an enormous library of photo filters, everything from simple designs to popular TV shows can be found in this truly amazing avatar creator. Wanna look like Arya from House Stark of Winterfell? No problem! Just click on the preset, add your own photo and there you go - you have a fearsome direwolf right beneath your beautiful face! Whether it is a 3D cartoon face or a full-body photo art, AI powered ToonMe delivers outstanding results within just seconds.

Wonderful Profile Picture Maker
ToonMe is the coolest app to create and edit pictures for your social networks. Making an awesome profile pic has never been any easier - all you have to do is just take a photo, choose from hundreds of art filters, and let the portrait AI do all the work for you! And if that’s not enough, you can always toon up your already breathtaking pic with awesome tools like adding animation, custom texts and mind-blowing filters for pictures.

Stunning Backgrounds & Photo Effects
Have you ever dreamed of having your own portrait painted by a professional artist? With this app you can have your own photo art customized with all sorts of photo editor effects. Say you have a nice photo, but you don’t like the background? ToonMe got you covered! This astonishing picture editor can change the background of your photos while keeping the high quality on top of adding some more filters for pictures and lens effects to make your pictures look like real photo art.

Cartoon Photo Editor to Unleash Your Imagination
Along with many other things, ToonMe is a picture editor with a lot of awesome visual effects and tools to edit and toon your photos. While using numerous styles and beauty filters, you get to decide which parts of your photos will be affected by the filters you chose, which makes this picture editor extremely customizable. This easy-to-use avatar maker will make you feel like a true artist - you can do anything with your photos, from removing a background to adding one of your own to make a beautiful and original photo.

Choose and Go
Keep all the things you need at your fingertips - you have instant access to all the latest trends, best oil painting filters, the coolest styles and lens effects. All you gotta do is just select, apply and if you want to, share your cartoon photo of your friends with just one tap on your screen!
Think of it as your personal digital artist and cartoon creator ready to make your toon dream come true, from simple ready-to-use art filters to amazing animated pictures. Everything is delivered in high quality as if it was created in a professional photo editor.
What happens to your cartoon picture next is totally up to you - who are we to limit you, right? Surprise your friends by sharing the result on your favorite social networks like Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, you name it. Or let ToonMe be your profile picture maker and update your user pic as often as you want. Feel like keeping it private and only sending it via messenger? Whatever makes you happy!

Do you feel like creating a cartoon me photo art of your selfie? Are you looking for a fresh new avatar for your Instagram profile? Look no more! With ToonMe, a cartoon creator and selfie editor with loads of face filters, you can turn your selfie into astonishing art that makes you stand out!

app.summary: Toon up your photos with hundreds of styles and art lens in ToonMe.

reviews.text: I love the app and the results it gives me - I even used one as my profile pic! However, I'm a little preturbed (to say the least) that I paid $34.99 for the "pro versions" yearly subscription through July 1, 2022, and the app is still saying that I need the "pro version" to unlock certain filters. Not only that, I couldn't find a way to contact anyone about it through the app. Please fix this or refund my money.
reviews.replyText: Dear Kathryn, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We understand how frustrating this must be. Please, contact us at support@pho.to and we will send you detailed instructions on how to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience!

reviews.text: Nice and fun. But definitely needs a tune up for the styles and improvement. some of the art styles made me blond. Kinda cool, but I am definitely not blond I'm wondering why it does that sometimes. Also I was hoping to have my features a bit more feminine.

You've got a lot of work to do!! I lived the free version of the app. All worked smoothly and I got some really fun results. I wanted to get rid of the thumbnails in the lower left corner and assumed that going "pro" would allow me to do that. Well, I was wrong. Not only do the thumbnails stay but the "pro" filters are full of unwanted and unneeded overlays, such as frames, sparkes and stickers. There was actually less flexibility in the pro section than in the free. Running out of words...
reviews.replyText:
Hello! The PRO subscription opens the PRO effects, removes Ads and a watermark on the final image. But thank you
for this feature idea, we have already brought this idea to our relevant department.

reviews.text: Awful. I bought this app after playing with it and thinking it was great, after buying it, I am totally unable to edit my photos. There's clearly a glitch and I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app, cleared the cache, restarted my phone, etc. I've emailed the ToonMe support email 4 times. There are a lot of cartoon apps to choose from on GooglePlay-- save your $30 a year for an app that works. Updated 4/2/22 to add: the company has not contacted me to resolve the issue. Still can't use.
reviews.replyText: Hello! We are really sorry for the misunderstanding. Could you please send us your GPA (order number) at support@pho.to so we can try to resolve the issue? Thanks in advance.

reviews.text: it's great! Super Great! the App is absolutely wonderful, with gorgeous and beautiful output and effects! but I think the app has an error in male gender, cant totally transform your photo if you're a male, it adds a girls face to a male's face in most cases. I sure think ToonMe should improve in that aspect. Aside that, the app is a whole wonderful 👍

great 😊 but I which I can have access to the premium at a lesser price I would appreciate it. I mean things are so hard and feeding is a problem to some people and you using $45,000 for Editing photo is a little bit crazy right. I really love it 💞💞💞💞💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕

A fun toy. The 3D Disney filter exceeds expectations, and I am truly impressed by it. None of the other filters are particularly great, but that's okay. My biggest peeve is that, just a day after downloading it, the app has stopped letting me filter photos, and only lets me use the feed. No indication is given why this is, or if and when I can expect the filter function to work again. Kind of defeats the purpose of having the app if it doesn't work reliably.
reviews.replyText:
Hi,
thanks for the feedback, we are happy you liked the Disney filter. We know that there are moments when the "Upload Photo" button may not be available in the ToonMe tab. It means that we work on the tab. Please be sure, that all the hottest effects from the ToonMe tab are also available at the top of the Feed tab. They work in the same way.

reviews.text: It does a nice job but the watermark ruins everything. when are you devs gonna realize watermarks make your apps unusable? and the biggest problem is it takes your Image and crops it on it own so that the face takes up most of the Image. How about letting the user decide this. And no I'm not paying for pro just shoot me some ads and make your money off me like that. The search for the perfect Image animator continues.
reviews.replyText: Hello! Thanks for the review. In the Free version you can remove the watermark from the effects by watching the short AD video. Sometimes it happens, the AD videos are running out, because the option was used too often or the video for your region is not available currently.

reviews.text: Surprisingly fun to use! Wanted to see for myself if it was so awfully scammy as described by so many. As long as you're able to press X to go away from the ads, you're fine. Apps like these mainly depend on ads, watching them won't kill you. You're not forced to get Pro, but there's pro filters. The free features are surprisingly good. The filters actually rendered adorable results. I'm surprised this app has so many negative reviews.

The app is amazing. I would have given it a five-star rating except for a recent development. The app crashes on my Android phone each time I want to use it. Please update the app or something. My Android is of version 11, it worked well when I used it in another Android phone of version 10. Kindly look into this. I really need the app to work on my phone without crashing. Thank you.
reviews.replyText:
Hello! Thank you for informing us about the issue! We need more details to help you resolve this issue. Our team asks you to send us the email via the app:
Open the “About” section on the left menu and “Inform about the problem” and send the already attached file (log) with a little description of the issue.

app.developerLegalAddress: Unit No: F33, DMCC Business Centre, Level No 13, AG Tower, إمارة دبيّ, United Arab Emirates
app.recentChanges: The best day for something great is... today! Update your app and become one of the first to play with our new awesome styles and effects! Hurry up, they're waiting ;)
app.AIReview:
ToonMe Photo Cartoon Maker Review – A Detailed Analysis

Overview

ToonMe, boasting over 109 million installs and a robust 4.47591 rating, is a mobile app firmly rooted in the photography category designed to transform selfies into cartoon-style artworks instantly. The app’s core proposition revolves around providing users with an extensive library of filters and effects, allowing them to create unique avatars for social media platforms like Instagram and Snapchat. It's positioned as a simple, one-tap solution for turning everyday photos into stylized art, catering primarily to younger demographics eager to express their creativity and enhance their online presence. The app’s popularity suggests a successful formula – accessible tools combined with the universally appealing desire to create visually engaging content.

Key Features

ToonMe's feature set is centered around its vast filter collection. Here's a breakdown of the key components:

  • Extensive Filter Library: The app offers hundreds of pre-designed filters categorized into various styles, including realistic cartoon looks, anime effects, popular TV show recreations (like Stranger Things and Harry Potter), and abstract artistic designs. This is arguably its strongest selling point – the sheer variety ensures there’s something for almost every user preference.
  • One-Tap Transformation: The core functionality of ToonMe is a remarkably quick process. Users simply upload a selfie, and the app automatically applies one of the available filters, delivering the stylized image in a single tap. This ease of use is a major draw for casual users.
  • Manual Adjustment Tools: While the "one-tap" feature is impressive, ToonMe also includes basic manual adjustment tools such as brightness, contrast, saturation, and vignette controls to allow users some level of customization after the initial transformation.
  • Avatar Creation & Sharing: The app facilitates direct sharing to popular social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, and TikTok. Users can save their creations directly to their device’s gallery.
  • New Filter Updates: ToonMe regularly releases new filters and effects through updates, keeping the experience fresh and encouraging continued engagement.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: The app's intuitive design and one-tap transformation functionality are undeniably its biggest strengths. It removes the technical barriers often associated with photo editing apps, making it accessible to users of all skill levels.
  • Vast Filter Selection: With hundreds of filters available, ToonMe truly delivers on its promise of variety. The inclusion of popular TV show styles significantly increases its appeal and provides a constant stream of trending content.
  • High Engagement Potential: The app’s focus on creating visually appealing content naturally fosters sharing and engagement within social media communities.
  • Regular Updates: The frequent addition of new filters demonstrates the developers' commitment to maintaining user interest and providing ongoing value.

Areas for Improvement

  • Filter Quality Variation: While there are many filters, the quality is noticeably inconsistent. Some filters produce stunning results, while others appear blurry or artificially applied, particularly at lower resolutions. A more rigorous quality control process would significantly improve the overall experience.
  • Limited Manual Control: The manual adjustment tools are relatively basic and lack granular controls. Users seeking fine-tuned adjustments might find themselves frustrated by the limitations.
  • Overreliance on Filters: The app’s core functionality is entirely dependent on filters. It lacks robust traditional photo editing features like cropping, resizing, or advanced color correction.
  • Potential for Battery Drain: Applying complex filters and frequently saving high-resolution images can potentially contribute to battery drain on mobile devices.

User Experience

The user experience within ToonMe is generally smooth and intuitive. The app’s interface is clean and uncluttered, making it easy to navigate between the filter categories. The one-tap transformation process is impressively fast, providing immediate visual feedback. However, the sheer volume of filters can sometimes feel overwhelming initially, leading to a slight learning curve as users browse through the options. The app's responsiveness could be improved; occasional lag when uploading or applying filters was observed during testing.

Value for Money

ToonMe is offered entirely free of charge, supported by in-app advertisements and potential opportunities for premium filter purchases (though these are not prominently displayed). This makes it an exceptionally accessible option for users who simply want to experiment with cartoon effects without any financial commitment. The lack of a subscription model or outright purchase price represents excellent value, especially considering the breadth of its features.

Conclusion

ToonMe is a highly successful mobile app that effectively leverages the popularity of selfie-based content and social media trends. Its core strength – the effortless creation of cartoonized photos with a single tap – makes it incredibly appealing to a broad audience, particularly younger users. While there are areas for improvement regarding filter quality, manual controls, and overall responsiveness, the app’s ease of use, vast filter library, and free access make it a worthwhile download. With its high install count and positive rating, ToonMe demonstrates a clear understanding of user preferences and continues to be a dominant player in the photo editing space focused on stylized transformations. It's a solid choice for anyone looking for a fun and easy way to create unique social media content – just don’t expect professional-level photo editing capabilities.
